policies.involuntary_refund: If flight is canceled or itinerary is affected by 3+ hours, a refund is permitted. Agents must process the refund before departure.
policies.involuntary_reissue: Agents may reissue on the same flight, or next available flight same day on same carrier/class/route. If none available, pax can choose flight within ±3 days. Must be done before departure.
policies.voluntary_refund: Proceed according to the fare rules listed on the ticket.
policies.medical_refund: Refunds or reissues that fall outside of involuntary policies require written authorization. Submit to CRC Helpdesk with supporting documents.
policies.name_change:
Minor name corrections permitted via SSR message and copy of passport:
- LAST NAME: 1-letter correction (SR KP LAST NAME CORRECTION TO ...)
- FIRST NAME: 2-letter correction (SR KP FIRST NAME CORRECTION TO ...)
- Other corrections require escalation.
Escalation emails: crcxdesk@flyasky.com, CC akemeh@flyasky.com, asiro@flyasky.com, lity@flyasky.com
policies.group_booking:
Groups of 10+ passengers. Confirmations handled by CRC/Group Desk. Penalties:
- Date change ≥72h: XOF 30,000
- Date change <72h: XOF 60,000
- Refund ≥72h: 50% base + YR tax
- Refund <72h or no-show: Non-refundable
policies.infant_policy: Infants must be accompanied by a guardian. Infant + carrier are not part of free baggage and are subject to surcharge. Carrier may limit total infants per flight. Advance request required.
policies.baggage_policy: Allowance varies by route/class. Valuables must not be in checked bags. Excess baggage is subject to surcharge. Lost/delayed bags not claimed in 3 months may be discarded. Liability limited to 1,131 SDR per passenger unless declared.
policies.seat_request_policy: Seats are not guaranteed. Operational changes may reassign seats. Special meals require 48h notice. Passengers with reduced mobility should notify carrier in advance.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy: 24h refund allowed if ticket purchased ≥24h before departure. Saver fares canceled ≥14 days prior get 50% credit. Otherwise, ticket is non-refundable. Refunds processed to original payment method within 7 business days.
